successes.title: Spike : Laser accurate measurement & modeling on smartphones
successes.description: Measure, model & 3D print your world, fast. Experience laser accurate Augmented Reality. Develop immersive laser based smartphone apps.

Pledges.description: FRIENDS! Thanks so much for your support - every little bit helps! You'll get status updates, Spike Hall of Fame acknowledgement and priority access to apps when they are available. You'll also get our thanks!
SUPER FRIENDS! That's SUPER support, and deserves recognition in the shape of everything that FRIENDS get PLUS an original Spike cap!

EARLY BIRD: SPIKE PRO! You're first and you get the lot!  A Spike Unit + ADVANCED app and API access and 1 year of FREE software upgrades - essentially everything we build for Spike for a whole year! (Smartphone not included!)

NOT-QUITE-SO-EARLY BIRD: SPIKE PRO! By popular demand we've added 100 slightly later bird rewards. Just like the Early Birds you get the lot! A Spike Unit + ADVANCED app and API access and 1 year of FREE software upgrades - essentially everything we build for Spike for a whole year! (Smartphone not included!)

ALMOST EARLY BIRD! OK - so you’re a bit later. But heck, we’ve been overwhelmed with interest for ……… yip: more Spike PRO’s!  Get everything in the PRO package at less than half of the RRP when in the market.

SPIKE BASIC! Missed the early bird spike? Don't fret - this reward still gets Spike's phenomenal functionality in your hands for a fraction of the market price, but with just the core functionality - remote location, height and missing line measurements. If you are a laser range finder user this reward will knock your socks off! 
(Smartphone not included!)

SPIKE PRO! Need a little more from your measurements? Like area, volume, polygon dimensions, 3D modelling, verification of a target's exact location and measurement from within images?  Then Spike PRO's additional measurement & modeling capability will blow you away.

This reward provides a Spike Unit + ADVANCED app and API access and 1 year of FREE software upgrades - essentially everything we build for Spike for a whole year!  
(Smartphone not included!)

SPIKE BETA! 100 Early-delivery beta versions of Spike with all the SPIKE PRO trimmings. Uniquely numbered 1-100.
You get access to the API and Spike product before anyone else in the world...you'll be delivering apps before anyone else!!
(Smartphone not included!)

PRE-PROD SPIKE! the first five, unique, tested and certified pre-production units. Get a Spike ahead of the pack that's ahead of the pack!
Uniquely numbered and signed!
(Smartphone not included!)

SPIKE OFFICE PACK! A pre-packed box of 5 Spike PRO. (Spike + Advanced app and API access + 1 year of free software upgrades). Perfect for a firm of constant measurers & modelers!
(Smartphones not included!)

SPIKE WITH US! How about a personalised Spike PLUS a 5 star dinner with us?!
(Smartphone not included!)

THE ORIGINAL SPIKE! It's our baby and we're pretty sweet on it...but we'll let it go to a devoted home. This is the one and only original working prototype Spike - own a little piece of history!
(Smartphone not included!)
